title: Lord Loss
description: The first book in the Demonata, the demonic symphony in ten parts by multi-million-copy bestselling horror writer Darren Shan…				When Grubbs Grady first encounters Lord Loss and his evil minions, he learns three things:• the world is vicious,• magic is possible,• demons are real.				He thinks that he will never again witness such a terrible night of death and darkness.				…He is wrong.
author: Darren Shan
